statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.UserID , AA.GroupID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TUserGroup AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.UserID , AA.GroupID , AA.UseYn FROM dbo.TUserGroup AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UserID = #UserID# AND AA.GroupID = #GroupID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TUserGroup ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, UserID, GroupID, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #UserID#, #GroupID#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TUserGroup SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, UserID = #UserID# , GroupID = #GroupID# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
